“Pour construire une vision commune il faut commencer par construire le collectif.”

SEVEN

Our workshops about Team Building

BUILDING THE LEGO TOWER


Each team will build a LEGO tower, according to the three following objective goals: the height of the tower, the building speed and the number of bricks used, and one subjective goal: beauty!

Teams will have 45 minutes to build their tower, then all towers will be linked together by the whole group.

CREATING VALUE TOGETHER


Following the example of Kyle MacDonald's One Red Paperclip, participants will identify their common values.

Participants will work as a group to define the most important things for them, and will practice negociation and communication to reach the common goal af the group.

Any workshop or module you would love to add to your training program ?

We regurlarly create and expand our workshops catalog. We wish to make a coherent, connected and evolutive repertoire out of it. Let's talk about your needs, and explore together the possibilities.
